import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove category from site"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/categories/{categoryId}/site"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Disables an asset category for the current site so it no longer appears in category picklists or assignment workflows.

**Prerequisites**
1. **categoryId** - Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/assets/categories/site](/docs/api/assets/get-available-asset-categories) before disabling.

**Workflow Example**
1. List enabled categories: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/categories/site](/docs/api/assets/get-available-asset-categories) -&gt; confirm the target `CategoryId`.
2. Remove the category: [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/categories/\{categoryId\}/site](/docs/api/assets/remove-category-from-site).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `categoryId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"categoryId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the category","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
